title.narrative: Irrigation: Participatory Small-scale Water Resources Sector Project

description.narrative: Key project objective - to develop sustainable stakeholder driven small-scale water resource management systems. Policy and institutional objectives - there is a policy reform agenda associated with the project. The agenda includes: (i) improving the policy/planning and legal framework for small-scale water resources; (ii) fostering integrated water resource management and water conservation; (iii) improving and sustaining O&M; and (iv) improving governance in water resource management.

name.narrative: Irrigation: Participatory Small-scale Water Resources Sector Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
